scripts.build:examples: rm -rf ./exampels/node_modules && npm pack && cd ./examples && npm install ../thmsdmcrt-ecs-$npm_package_version.tgz && rm -rf ../thmsdmcrt-ecs-$npm_package_version.tgz
scripts.release: v=$npm_package_version && git commit -am $v && git tag -s $v -m $v && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
